dict.string:
#Desc: Places current date in the pasteboard #Use: cdate <type> #Ex: cdate d
#Types of time information available are # d-date (Day, Month Date, Year) # s-short date (YYYYMMDD) # t-time (HH:MM:SS AM/PM) # b-both date & time
php -f script.php -- {query} | pbcopy echo "Current date is now ready in the pasteboard"
Copy current time or date to the pasteboard
